SEARCH
Package gl.view

Class GLFooter

java.lang.Object
gl.view.GLFooter
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLUpdateListener
public class GLFooter extends Object implements GLUpdateListener
The GLFooter class represents the footer of the Game of Life application. It provides user interface components and controls for interacting with the game. This class is responsible for managing buttons, input fields, and displaying game information to the user. It also implements the GLUpdateListener interface to receive updates from the game model and update the user interface accordingly.

    • GLFooter

      public GLFooter(GLView glView, ResourceBundle bundle, int window_w, int window_h, int b_width, int b_height)
      Constructs a new GLFooter object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      glView - The main view of the Game of Life application.
      bundle - The ResourceBundle used for localization.
      window_w - The width of the application window.
      window_h - The height of the application window.
      b_width - The width of the game board.
      b_height - The height of the game board.
